item.title: HelSec Virtual Meetup #13
item.description: Welcome to the HelSec Virtual Meetup 13! ü§ó Join the discussion on Discord: https://discord.gg/NBvCAm8 18:00 - Stream start and word by HelSec 18:15 - “Usage of BYOD & COTS in Military operations” by Sami Raut√©n 19:00 - Short break 19:15 - “UEBA in Cyber Security ‚Äì My First Impressions” by Tomi R√§s√§nen (the presentation will be held in Finnish) 20:00 - Short break 20:15 - “Adversary Infrastructure Report 2021: Back to Bots” by Greg Lesnewich

item.title: New website live
item.description: Our new website is finally here! The website may have bugs which you are more than welcomed to fix. Or if you want to add features / designs / improve the site otherways you can do pull requests on Github.
